name: Joren Kade
personality: Calm, methodical, grease permanently under his nails.
description: Joren keeps the caravans rolling. He can fix anything with wheels, and half the things without them.
questHooks: Needs help retrieving a lost tool crate near Sloan.
Says a caravan brought in a strange humming cap.
